Summary: I saw what I believe was a UFO early this a.m.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 4:20a.m,not being able to sleep and bored with FaceBook I stepped out onto my deck to potty my beagle,Bob and to smoke a cigarette and check the weather. I found a clear and star-lit sky, not at all hazy considering the high humidity. I am located about 2 miles west of the town of Charlotte and the deck faces south. As I looked about the sky I noted a reddish object do-south about 30-45 degrees above the horizon and approximately 12-15 miles away which I initially suspected was a star or planet, though on closer inspection this object was in motion.It was definitely headed do-north toward me though it sort of "bounced", right,left,up,down and when it had covered maybe half of that 12-15 mile distance it turned sharply to the east and I lost sight of it in the trees surrounding my yard and I was not able to catch sight of it again. I kind of stood there for a second digesting what I had just seen and remarked to the dog,"I think we just saw a UFO". I was not fearful but maybe a bit anxious as I hurried Bob and myself back into the house where I tried,unsuccessfully to go back to bed and sleep.
